titles: Pro Vere, autumni lachrymæ. Inscribed to the immortal memorie of the most pious and incomparable souldier, Sir Horatio Vere, Knight: besieged, and distrest in Mainhem. By Geo: Chapman.
author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
publisher: Printed by B. Alsop for Th. Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Eagle and Child in Britaines Burse,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Vere of Tilbury, Horace Vere, --  Baron, 1565-1635 --  Poetry.
